price: “Ne rekoh li ja”, reče onaj, “da ti, doista, nećeš moći izdržati sa mnom?”
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
